title: Distinguished Society
description: E-commerce website for a clothing brand.Implemented features like payment gateway, email scheduler, email notifications, otp login , goggle authentication. Implemented guest login and multi-currency conversion. Integrated Shiprocket api for shipment support and order tracking.Deployed the application on AWS EC2 .Tech stack - Next.js, Node.js , MonogoDb, AWS EC2.

title: Tyke
description: Freelance project for Tyke. Tyke is a start-up investment platform. Worked on features like - Bank account verification, Official document verification , E-sign for kyc using digio. Integrated services like Google Analytics, Segment, Payment Gateway, Twiliio and Sendgrid. Implemented goggle and facebook authenetication.Delivered performance-driven and user-centric websites that met all business requirements. Tech Stack - React.js , Node.js , MonogoDb, AWS EC2.
